verses.verse: And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%> unto his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H4940><s%>, and with all the family of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>'s father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%>, I pray you <S%H241><s%>, in the ears of all the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, Whether is better <S%H2896><s%> for you <S%H1121><s%>, that all the sons of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%>, who are threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons <S%H376><s%>, rule <S%H4910><s%> over you <S%H259><s%>, or that one rule <S%H4910><s%> over you <S%H2142><s%>? remember also that I am your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> of him in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>: and their hearts <S%H3820><s%> inclined <S%H5186><s%> to follow <S%H310><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>; for they said <S%H559><s%>, He is our brother <S%H251><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> him threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baal-berith <S%H1170><s%>, wherewith Abimelech <S%H40><s%> hired <S%H7936><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> and light <S%H6348><s%> fellows <S%H582><s%>, who followed <S%H3212><s%> him <S%H310><s%>.

And he went <S%H935><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> at Ophrah <S%H6084><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%>, being threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons <S%H376><s%>, upon one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>: but Jotham <S%H3147><s%> the youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%>; for he hid himself <S%H2244><s%>.

And all the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> assembled themselves together <S%H622><s%>, and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo <S%H4407><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> and made <S%H4427><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%>, by the oak <S%H436><s%> of the pillar <S%H5324><s%> that was in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.

And when they told <S%H5046><s%> it to Jotham <S%H3147><s%>, he went <S%H3212><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%>, and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and cried <S%H7121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, Hearken unto me <S%H1167><s%>, ye men of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, that God <S%H430><s%> may hearken unto you <S%H8085><s%>.

The trees <S%H6086><s%> went forth <S%H1980><s%> on a time to anoint <S%H4886><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over them <S%H559><s%>; and they said unto the olive-tree <S%H2132><s%>, Reign thou over us <S%H4427><s%>.

But the olive-tree <S%H2132><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2308><s%>, Should I leave my fatness <S%H1880><s%>, wherewith by me they honor <S%H3513><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man <S%H582><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> to and fro over the trees <S%H6086><s%>?
And the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the fig-tree <S%H8384><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> thou <S%H4427><s%>, and reign over us.

But the fig-tree <S%H8384><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2308><s%>, Should I leave my sweetness <S%H4987><s%>, and my good <S%H2896><s%> fruit <S%H8570><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> to and fro over the trees <S%H6086><s%>?
And the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the vine <S%H1612><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> thou <S%H4427><s%>, and reign over us.

And the vine <S%H1612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2308><s%>, Should I leave my new wine <S%H8492><s%>, which cheereth <S%H8055><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man <S%H582><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> to and fro over the trees <S%H6086><s%>?
Then said <S%H559><s%> all the trees <S%H6086><s%> unto the bramble <S%H329><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> thou <S%H4427><s%>, and reign over us.

And the bramble <S%H329><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the trees <S%H6086><s%>, If in truth <S%H571><s%> ye anoint <S%H4886><s%> me king <S%H4428><s%> over you <S%H935><s%>, then come and take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in my shade <S%H6738><s%>; and if not <S%H784><s%>, let fire come out <S%H3318><s%> of the bramble <S%H329><s%>, and devour <S%H398><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H6213><s%>, if ye have dealt truly <S%H571><s%> and uprightly <S%H8549><s%>, in that ye have made Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4427><s%>, and if ye have dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%>, and have done <S%H6213><s%> unto him according to the deserving <S%H1576><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>

(for my father <S%H1><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for you <S%H7993><s%>, and adventured his life <S%H5315><s%>, <S%H5048><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>:

and ye are risen up <S%H6965><s%> against my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, and have slain <S%H2026><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons <S%H376><s%>, upon one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, and have made Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of his maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, king <S%H4427><s%> over the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, because he is your brother <S%H251><s%>);

if ye then have dealt <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%> and uprightly <S%H8549><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and with his house <S%H1004><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, then rejoice <S%H8055><s%> ye in Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, and let him also rejoice in you <S%H8055><s%>:

but if not <S%H784><s%>, let fire come out <S%H3318><s%> from Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, and devour <S%H398><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo <S%H4407><s%>; and let fire <S%H784><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> from the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo <S%H4407><s%>, and devour <S%H398><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>.

And Jotham <S%H3147><s%> ran away <S%H1272><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> to Beer <S%H876><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H6440><s%>, for fear of Abimelech <S%H40><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>.
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> was prince <S%H7786><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> between Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>; and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with Abimelech <S%H40><s%>:

that the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> might come <S%H935><s%>, and that their blood <S%H1818><s%> might be laid <S%H7760><s%> upon Abimelech <S%H40><s%> their brother <S%H251><s%>, who slew <S%H2026><s%> them <S%H1167><s%>, and upon the men of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, who strengthened <S%H2388><s%> his hands to slay <S%H2026><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> liers-in <S%H693><s%>-wait for him on the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and they robbed <S%H1497><s%> all that came <S%H5674><s%> along that way <S%H1870><s%> by them <S%H5046><s%>: and it was told Abimelech <S%H40><s%>.

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and went over <S%H5674><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%>; and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> put their trust in him <S%H982><s%>.

And they went out <S%H3318><s%> into the field <S%H7704><s%>, and gathered <S%H1219><s%> their vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, and trod <S%H1869><s%> the grapes <S%H6213><s%>, and held festival <S%H1974><s%>, and went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of their god <S%H430><s%>, and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%>, and cursed <S%H7043><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>.

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Who is Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, and who is Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him <S%H1121><s%>? is not he the son of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%>? and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> his officer <S%H6496><s%>? serve <S%H5647><s%> ye the men <S%H582><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>: but why should we serve him <S%H5647><s%>?

And would that this people <S%H5971><s%> were under <S%H5414><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%>! then would I remove <S%H5493><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, Increase <S%H7235><s%> thine army <S%H6635><s%>, and come out <S%H3318><s%>.

And when Zebul <S%H2083><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%>, his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%>.

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto Abimelech <S%H40><s%> craftily <S%H8649><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1603><s%>, Gaal the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%>; and <S%H6696><s%>, behold, they constrain the city to take part against thee <S%H5892><s%>.
Now therefore <S%H6965><s%>, up by night <S%H3915><s%>, thou and the people <S%H5971><s%> that are with thee <S%H693><s%>, and lie in wait in the field <S%H7704><s%>:

and it shall be <S%H1242><s%>, that in the morning, as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> is up <S%H2224><s%>, thou shalt rise early <S%H7925><s%>, and rush upon the city <S%H5892><s%>; and <S%H5971><s%>, behold, when he and the people that are with him come out <S%H3318><s%> against thee <S%H3027><s%>, then mayest thou do <S%H6213><s%> to them as thou <S%H3027><s%> shalt find occasion <S%H4672><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H3915><s%>, by night, and they laid wait <S%H693><s%> against Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in four <S%H702><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%>.

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>: and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H3993><s%>, from the ambushment.

And when Gaal <S%H1603><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, he said <S%H559><s%> to Zebul <S%H2083><s%>, Behold <S%H3381><s%>, there come people <S%H5971><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>. And Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7200><s%>, Thou seest the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> as if they were men <S%H582><s%>.

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, See <S%H3381><s%>, there come people <S%H5971><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> by the middle <S%H2872><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and one company <S%H7218><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> by the way of <S%H1870><s%> the oak <S%H436><s%> of <S%H1870><s%> Meonenim <S%H6049><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Zebul <S%H2083><s%> unto him <S%H645><s%>, Where is now thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, that thou saidst <S%H559><s%>, Who is Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him <S%H5971><s%>? is not this the people that thou hast despised <S%H3988><s%>? go out <S%H3318><s%> now <S%H4994><s%>, I pray <S%H3898><s%>, and fight with them.
And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Abimelech <S%H40><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> chased <S%H7291><s%> him <S%H5127><s%>, and he fled before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H5307><s%>, and there fell many <S%H7227><s%> wounded <S%H2491><s%>, even unto the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Arumah <S%H725><s%>: and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> drove out <S%H1644><s%> Gaal <S%H1603><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, that they should not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.
And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, that the people <S%H5971><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> into the field <S%H7704><s%>; and they told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and divided <S%H2673><s%> them into three <S%H7969><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%>, and laid wait <S%H693><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>; and he looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H5971><s%>, behold, the people came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%>; And he rose up <S%H6965><s%> against them <S%H5221><s%>, and smote them.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, and the companies <S%H7218><s%> that were with him <S%H6584><s%>, rushed forward, and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>: and the two <S%H8147><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%> rushed upon <S%H6584><s%> all that were in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and smote them <S%H5221><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> all that day <S%H3117><s%>; and he took <S%H3920><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were therein <S%H5422><s%>: and he beat down the city <S%H5892><s%>, and sowed <S%H2232><s%> it with salt <S%H4417><s%>.

And when all the men <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof <S%H935><s%>, they entered into the stronghold <S%H6877><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H410><s%> El-berith <S%H1286><s%>.
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> that all the men <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> were gathered together <S%H6908><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> gat him up <S%H5927><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Zalmon <S%H6756><s%>, he and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H40><s%>; and Abimelech took <S%H3947><s%> an axe <S%H7134><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> a bough <S%H7754><s%> from the trees <S%H6086><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> it up <S%H7760><s%>, and laid it on his shoulder <S%H7926><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H7200><s%>, What ye have seen me do <S%H6213><s%>, make haste <S%H4116><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> as I have done <S%H3644><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> likewise cut down <S%H3772><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his bough <S%H7754><s%>, and followed <S%H3212><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> them to the stronghold <S%H6877><s%>, and set <S%H3341><s%> the stronghold <S%H6877><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%> upon them <S%H582><s%>; so that all the men of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> also <S%H505><s%>, about a thousand men <S%H376><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>.
Then went <S%H3212><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> to Thebez <S%H8405><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against Thebez <S%H8405><s%>, and took it <S%H3920><s%>.

But there was a strong <S%H5797><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and thither fled <S%H5127><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>, and all they <S%H1167><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and shut <S%H5462><s%> themselves in <S%H5927><s%>, and gat them up to the roof <S%H1406><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto the tower <S%H4026><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it <S%H5066><s%>, and drew near unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> to burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And a certain <S%H259><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> an upper <S%H6400><s%> millstone <S%H7393><s%> upon Abimelech <S%H40><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%>, and brake <S%H7533><s%> his skull <S%H1538><s%>.

Then he called <S%H7121><s%> hastily <S%H4120><s%> unto the young man <S%H5288><s%> his armorbearer <S%H5375><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H8025><s%>, Draw thy sword <S%H2719><s%>, and kill <S%H4191><s%> me <S%H559><s%>, that men say not of me <S%H802><s%>, A woman slew <S%H2026><s%> him <S%H5288><s%>. And his young man thrust him through <S%H1856><s%>, and he died <S%H4191><s%>.

And when the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Abimelech <S%H40><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%>, they departed <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his place <S%H4725><s%>.

Thus God <S%H430><s%> requited <S%H7725><s%> the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of Abimelech <S%H40><s%>, which he did <S%H6213><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, in slaying <S%H2026><s%> his seventy <S%H7657><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%>;
